text: Pizza is usually very greasy. Service is fast. Employees usually don‚Äôt understand what you want so it‚Äôs better to order on the app if you want your order correct. text: Doesnt really have much "dine-in" space for large families or groups like most pizza hits but has the best pizza of any Pizza hut in this neck of the woods or at least surrounding counties!! Nice people that work there also you guys are a great group!!
